1.3. 重写月份过滤器

@File : filters.py @Author : niuxingjie @Time : 2022/4/15 14:59 @Description :

class utils.drf.filters.MonthDateField(*, input_formats=None, **kwargs)[源代码]

基类：django.forms.fields.DateField

重写月份校验字段：

  • 2006-10

input_formats = ['%Y-%m']
class utils.drf.filters.MonthDateRangeField(*args, **kwargs)[源代码]

基类：django_filters.fields.RangeField

自定义月份起止过滤字段:

  • start: 2022-01 --> 2022-01-01

  • end: 2022-02 --> 2022-02-28

compress(data_list)[源代码]

Return a single value for the given list of values. The values can be assumed to be valid.

For example, if this MultiValueField was instantiated with fields=(DateField(), TimeField()), this might return a datetime object created by combining the date and time in data_list.

widget

:py:class:`django_filters.widgets.DateRangeWidget`的别名

class utils.drf.filters.MonthFromToRangeFilter(field_name=None, lookup_expr=None, *, label=None, method=None, distinct=False, exclude=False, **kwargs)[源代码]

基类：django_filters.filters.RangeFilter

用于月份范围内数据字段的过滤：
  • 2022-01到2024-02之间的数据

    • 2022-01-01 00:00:00

    • 2024-02-29 23:59:59.999999

使用示例：
  • 过滤字段用法：

    sign = MonthFromToRangeFilter(field_name='credit_certificate__confirm_at')

  • 输入两个字段：

    • sign_after --> 2022-01

    • sign_before --> 2024-02

field_class

:py:class:`utils.drf.filters.MonthDateRangeField`的别名
